welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nanzhou, Taiwan! Get ready to be mesmerized by the city's vibrant culture, delicious food, and breathtaking landscapes. We invite you to immerse yourself in our charming city and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Kaoshiung International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal exclusively used for international flights, with modern amenities and facilities.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after watching a short advertisement.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pingtung Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pingtung Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
